thread.title: EastEnders' Dot Branning shocks fans as she takes great-grandson Matthew for a drive... despite being almost BLIND
thread.title_full: EastEnders' Dot Branning shocks fans as she takes great-grandson Matthew for a drive... despite being almost BLIND

title: EastEnders' Dot Branning shocks fans as she takes great-grandson Matthew for a drive... despite being almost BLIND
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments SHE confessed to her friend that she is losing her eyesight but that doesn’t appear to have stopped Dot Branning getting behind the wheel of her car. 
But could she be putting her great-grandson’s life at risk because of it? BBC 3 Dot Cotton takes great-grandson Matthew for a drive even though she is losing her sight 
In a scene to be shown on tomorrow night’s episode, the Walford matriarch takes her great-grandson Matthew out for drive in her little car. 
In the clip which was released by the show, Dot, played by June Brown, is seen chatting away to the little lad who is the son of her grandson Charlie and the late Ronnie Mitchell. BBC 3 Dot takes Matthew to the garden centre after Jack is unable to drive her there 
Following the instructions of her sat-nav, she thanks the device and says, “Ever so well-spoken. Ain’t she, Matt?” 
She then tells the boy what Lent is all about and how proud his real daddy is of him. EastEnders Dot Cotton takes great-grandson for a drive despite losing her eyesight 
A screen grab from the clip was posted on Facebook fan page Walford East and fans rushed to comment, with some suggesting she is taking Matthew to see Charlie. 
But other commented that not only should Charlie not be in the front seat, but he shouldn’t be facing the windscreen. LATEST IN TV & SHOWBIZ Danniella Westbrook spotted driving £60k new car fresh from a visit to a beauty salon HAVING A REAR-LY GOOD TIME Cheeky Lisa Appleton flashes her bum on a wild mini-break in Amsterdam LOOKING COSY Jeremy McConnell and Stephanie Davis look happier than ever as they're spotted in Liverpool hotel 'WHAT A DISGRACE' Jamie O'Hara brands ex Danielle Lloyd a 'disgrace' and claims she's banned him from seeing kids SHORT HAIR DON'T CARE Stephanie Davis has revealed a dramatic new look and chopped her long hair into a chic bob BUMP OFF Pregnant stars Amy Childs and Billie Faiers show off their growing baby bumps in stunning snaps LATE NIGHT RUN Shane Warne is caught out after posting that he is leaving UK... before being spotted in London strip club THE COUNTDOWN IS ON Emma Willis treats herself to a last minute facial as the stars prepare for the Brit Awards 
Turns out that Dot is taking Matthew to the garden centre after Jack Branning was unable to – but will her eyesight fail her on the drive home? 
During last year’s Halloween episode, Dot confessed to Patrick Trueman that she was losing her sight after he grew concerned over her reclusive behaviour. PA:Press Association 3 June Brown recently celebrated her 90th birthday 
June Brown, who is one of the original EastEnders cast members, recently turned the grand old age of 90. 
But she admitted she is uncertain about Dot’s future on the soap after the character lost her job at the launderette.
